summary: Thirty years after her accidental death at her 1957 senior prom, the tortured spirit of prom queen Mary Lou Maloney returns to seek revenge.
cast: Michael Ironside|Wendy Lyon|Louis Ferreira|Lisa Schrage|Richard Monette|Terri Hawkes|Brock Simpson|Beverley Hendry|Beth Gondek|Wendell Smith|Judy Mahbey|Steve Atkinson|Robert Lewis|Lorretta Bailey|Howard Kruschke|Dennis Robinson|Michael Evans|John Pyper-Ferguson|Larry Musser|Glen Gretzky|Vincent Gale|Kirk Grayson|Paul McGaffey|David Robertson|Jean Olsen|Jay Smith|Marek Forysinski|Deryck Hazel|Kelly Simpson|Geoff Brumlik|Kevin Hare|Myfanwy Meilen|Sharon Alexander|Roy Babiuk|Brian Knox McGugan|Laura Derwentwater|Thomas Houg|Greg Rhodes|Sherry Boisvert|Shannon Fountain|Adria Budd Johnson|Amanda Gray|Vanessa King|Paul Owen
